job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Syngenta, we believe every employee has a role to play in safely feeding the world and taking care of our planet. To support that challenge, the Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development team is currently seeking a Pipeline Tool Developer located in Durham, NC. Role may also be based at our Enkhuizen, Netherlands location., Role purpose: Syngenta is currently seeking a full stack developer with strong technical and interpersonal skills to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in delivering innovative and robust analytical tools which enables product advancement and placement for Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development, Syngenta., * Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics.
     * Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing.
     * Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software.
     * Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization.
     * Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
     * Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment.
     * Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues.
     * Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments.
job_details.full_text:
Pipeline Tool Developer

At Syngenta, we believe every employee has a role to play in safely feeding the world and taking care of our planet. To support that challenge, the Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development team is currently seeking a Pipeline Tool Developer located in Durham, NC. Role may also be based at our Enkhuizen, Netherlands location., Role purpose: Syngenta is currently seeking a full stack developer with strong technical and interpersonal skills to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in delivering innovative and robust analytical tools which enables product advancement and placement for Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development, Syngenta., * Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics.
     * Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing.
     * Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software.
     * Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization.
     * Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
     * Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment.
     * Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues.
     * Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and maintaining data pipelines, designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines, and implementing MLOps practices like CI/CD and containerization. While it mentions user interfaces for data visualization, the core focus remains on the underlying infrastructure and model deployment, aligning with the ML Engineer profile.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and upkeep of data pipelines, a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the automation and management of data infrastructure and operations, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of complete ML pipelines, which involves the modeling aspect of machine learning.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization.
job_tasks.justification: This involves building user interfaces for applications, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD is a fundamental practice within MLOps for automating software and model deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment.
job_tasks.justification: Containerization (e.g., Docker) and orchestration (e.g., Kubernetes) are key MLOps practices for deploying and managing applications in the cloud.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the operational aspects of maintaining deployed models, including monitoring and performance optimization, which are MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the deployment and management of software in various environments, a core MLOps function.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in delivering innovative and robust analytical tools which enables product advancement and placement for Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with teams to deliver tools that support business goals (product advancement and placement).

technologies.justification: Refers to processing data using cloud infrastructure.
Refers to the core concept of machine learning models, implying the use of related libraries/frameworks.
Indicates the use of tools and techniques for in-depth data analysis.
While not explicitly an LLM framework, building UIs for applications often involves web development frameworks.
Directly refers to the use of tools for visualizing data.

technologies.phrase: continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
technologies.justification: CI/CD is a key component of MLOps and data pipelines.
Containerization is a standard MLOps practice.
Orchestration, often referring to tools like Kubernetes, is part of MLOps.
Refers to deployment and management within cloud platforms.

soft_skills.justification: Mentions 'interpersonal skills' which directly relates to communication and collaboration.
Explicitly states the need to collaborate with diverse teams.
Implies a need for creative problem-solving to develop innovative tools and a pragmatic approach to ensure robustness.
Focuses on finding efficient and automated solutions to operational challenges.

soft_skills.phrase: optimizing the performance of deployed models
soft_skills.justification: Requires analytical thinking and practical solutions to improve model performance.
Suggests a need to stay updated with and apply current industry best practices.
